data.meaning: adv. 在前、以前 prep.在...之前 conj.在...之前、与其...宁可

app_sentences.en: Remember to wash your hands before you have dinner.
app_sentences.cn: 记得在吃晚饭前洗手。

app_sentences.en: The workers are busy trying to sweep away the thick snow.
app_sentences.cn: 工人们正忙着清除厚雪。

app_sentences.en: I wish you good luck in your final English exam tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 我祝你明天的英语期末考试好运。

app_sentences.en: Please put the fruit and cakes on the small wooden table.
app_sentences.cn: 请把水果和蛋糕放在那个小木桌上。

app_sentences.en: We will celebrate Children's Day with a big party at school.
app_sentences.cn: 我们将在学校举行一个大型聚会来庆祝儿童节。

data.meaning: adj. 传统的、惯例的、口传的

app_sentences.en: We eat traditional food like dumplings during the Spring Festival.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在春节期间吃饺子之类的传统食物。

app_sentences.en: We usually make dumplings together on Chinese New Year's Eve.
app_sentences.cn: 我们通常在除夕夜一起包饺子。

app_sentences.en: I like watching music programmes on TV on Friday nights.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢在周五晚上从电视上看音乐节目。

app_sentences.en: Put on your sweater; it is getting cold outside this evening.
app_sentences.cn: 穿上你的毛衣；今晚外面正变冷。

data.meaning: n. 外套、(动物的)皮毛、(植物的)表皮

app_sentences.en: Put on your warm coat because it is cold outside now.
app_sentences.cn: 穿上你暖和的外套，因为现在外面很冷。

data.meaning: adj. 低劣的、卑鄙的、普通的

app_sentences.en: What does this new English word mean in Chinese?
app_sentences.cn: 这个新英文单词的中文意思是什么？

data.meaning: adj. 幸运的、吉祥的、侥幸的

app_sentences.en: She is very lucky to win the first prize in the competition.
app_sentences.cn: 她很幸运能在比赛中获得一等奖。

app_sentences.en: Everyone had a merry time at the birthday party yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 昨天生日聚会上每个人都过得很愉快。

app_sentences.en: - Merry Christmas to you! - Merry Christmas, thank you very much.
app_sentences.cn: —祝你圣诞快乐！—圣诞快乐，非常感谢。

app_sentences.en: Can you tell me the way to the nearest bus station, please?
app_sentences.cn: 你能告诉我最近的车站怎么走吗？

app_sentences.en: I think learning English is very important for our future.
app_sentences.cn: 我认为学习英语对我们的未来非常重要。
